channel.title: Comments on: Impulse Cosmetics Opaque Matte Lipstick in Smoking Gun

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/impulse-cosmetics-opaque-matte-lipstick-smoking-gun/#comment-883">Erika</a>.
Yep! They're off etsy, and on their own site. https://www.impulsecosmetics.com/
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Erika.

Yep! They’re off etsy, and on their own site. https://www.impulsecosmetics.com/

item.title: By: Erika
item.dc:creator: Erika
item.description: I love this color! Do you know if they have a site up where I can buy these? It looks like ImpulseCo isn't selling on etsy anymore... :(
item.content:encoded: I love this color! Do you know if they have a site up where I can buy these? It looks like ImpulseCo isn’t selling on etsy anymore… üôÅ

item.title: By: Elana Carello
item.dc:creator: Elana Carello
item.description: Had the WORST experience with this company. I ordered over a month ago and still no delivery. No replies to ANY emails, and they blocked me from messaging them further. Opened a case with Paypal and Etsy, but that's slow going. I don't understand how a company just IGNORES my please for a reply at the very least. Just the WORST customer service. Beware.
item.content:encoded: Had the WORST experience with this company. I ordered over a month ago and still no delivery. No replies to ANY emails, and they blocked me from messaging them further. Opened a case with Paypal and Etsy, but that’s slow going. I don’t understand how a company just IGNORES my please for a reply at the very least. Just the WORST customer service. Beware.

item.title: By: jenW
item.dc:creator: jenW
item.description: the hair, the lipstick... this look is so badass! I love it.
item.content:encoded: the hair, the lipstick… this look is so badass! I love it.
